data.question: Tesla has combined many sales centers with service centers. Find the correct statements about Tesla and Ellon Musk:

option_answers.title: There always onsite technicians to support custmers
They believe that opening service center in a new area correspondens with increased customer value and demand
Tesla employee what's it calls Tesla Rangers - mobile technicians who can service vehicle at your house.

data.error_message: Not quite. You need to distinguish customer needs.
data.success_message: Well done! No onsite technician is required at all. The Model S can wirelessly upload data so technicians can view and fix problems online without ever needing to physically touch the car, leading to an entirely different customer experience and relashionship.
